attributes.action: Produce legislation to alter commercial sea fishing licences, to increase annual catch tonnage allowed to include all fish brought aboard, all non food fish species can then be sold for fish based bi products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each owner would purchase a licence to catch a set tonnage of fish per boat, when this target was reached the fishing would then cease. This would mean commercial trawlers could land and sell more fish with no dead fish returned to the sea.Any owner found flouting the regulations would face mandatory loss of vessel and equipment, plus fines.
